sections.description: This plugin will give you the ability to manage the way how comments are hadled in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2017-01-10
  • First version released!
Version 1.1 Release Date 2017-02-01
  • Added the ability to limit comments maximum and minimum length
  • Added the ability to disable HTML in comments
  • Some minor fixes and enhancements
